name: Journey to Wayne
description:
A small arcade-style game based on Drew Hayden Taylor's novel, "Motorcycles & Sweetgrass".  Play as a boy making his way to an island via canoe. Avoid enemies, collect power-ups, and play a "loon spotting" minigame to succeed. Try to finish with full hearts and a fast time for a high rank!

Made for a school project.

Made using GameMakerStudio2 with GML
